captions.text: Hey Tom, have you seen m-

I've filled the room with tiny, razor sharp
needles.
Well, i'm gonna go and get thi-
This room is filled with needles.

I don't know. The one that has been
messing with me for 4 hours now?
He didn't do it the way I like it.
Well, how do you like it?
Well, that explains why all the cups are gone...
Well, alright. I'm going to go.
I forgot the needles were here.
I'm actually surprised you made it this far...
Well, why aren't they stabbing you?
Tom, I did the washing up.
That doesn't prove he's not real...

Okay, well good luck the next time you wanna
watch TV!
Yup, I feel quite stupid now...
There is no time stopper is there Tom?
These needles were really expensive Dean.
